data.name: Paladin's Passage
data.detailed_description:
Use your Skills and Reflexes to Survive


Paladin's Passage is a challenging 2.5D single-screen platformer. Explore the deformed depths of the Delphic dungeons. Brave encounters with fantastic beasts. If you're lucky, perhaps you'll find an ancient artifact.

  • Navigate tricky levels to collect the key and get to the exit.
  • Dodge or destroy mythical enemies and magical traps.
  • Collect treasure and discover hidden items.
  • Dozens of hand-crafted levels to challenge your skills.
  • Create and share your own levels.

Seek Your Fortune in the Depths


Paladin's Passage is the story of the Dwarvish Paladin Thieren Cromlech's quest to save the Roman Empire. It is the final days of the rule of Charlemagne. The Emperor himself has given a quest to the legendary Paladin. He must enter the ruins under Delphi and recover an artifact of great power. Upon entering the catacombs under the ruined city, the Paladin discovers a massive infestation of evil monsters. Weapons are useless against these mythical creatures. Only fire is able to destroy them.

Realistic 3D Rendered Environments


Realistic 3D rendering brings the world of Paladin's Passage to life. Unreal Engine 5 drives the game to immerse you in the adventure.

Every one of our dozens of levels is hand-designed to challenge your skills.

Amazing magical effects light up the world. Play with your keyboard or gamepad. Customize the controls to suit your style.

Create, play and share your own maps online with the built-in level editor.

data.short_description: Explore deep beneath the ancient, ruined city of Delphi. Discover a secret, magical artifact that holds the power to save the Roman Empire. Many have ventured in search of the artifact. None have ever returned. Can you be the first to succeed?
data.reviews:
“Paladin’s Passage is a stylish 2.5D action platformer where you can place blocks to safeguard your character from hazards and use them as platforms to help traverse its tricky single-screen levels...it's got a great Unreal Engine 5 powered visual style and the fact that you can’t just kill the monsters means you have to think of more creative ways to avoid them.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.0 GHz or faster processors
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible, dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires dedicated GPU (Unreal Engine 5); 1080p 16:9 recommended resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster processors
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible, dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires dedicated GPU (Unreal Engine 5); 1080p 16:9 recommended resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.15.2 or later
  • Processor: Any, including Apple Silicon (M1 or later)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal 2.2 or later
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires dedicated GPU (Unreal Engine 5); 1080p 16:9 recommended resolution
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 12.4 or later
  • Processor: Any, including Apple Silicon (M1 or later)
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal 2.4 or later
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires dedicated GPU (Unreal Engine 5); 1080p 16:9 recommended resolution

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
